data.title: What is the best short stories of courage?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 12): In a scholarship exam, 30 students were given a sheet of paper and told to write about  "WHAT IS COURAGE" .The best answer would get the scholarship. Everyone started writing on the sheet of paper except one. He thought for a while. Then, he wrote just three words which were eno...
